plot: This story about choices unfolds through the perspective of two windows in separate apartments. A man watches his neighbor, a young woman, commit suicide. Does he help or will he sit there and watch her die?
title: From Within
plot_es: This story about choices unfolds through the perspective of two windows in separate apartments. A man watches his neighbor, a young woman, commit suicide. Does he help or will he sit there and watch her die?
plot_en: This story about choices unfolds through the perspective of two windows in separate apartments. A man watches his neighbor, a young woman, commit suicide. Does he help or will he sit there and watch her die?
